 class _HomeScreenState extends State<HomeScreen> {
   @override
   Widget build(BuildContext context) {
-    return Container();

+          children: [

+              'Home Screen',
+              style: TextStyle(fontSize: 24),
+            ),
+            ElevatedButton(
+              onPressed: () {
+                Navigator.pushNamed(context, '/draw');
+              },
+              child: const Text('Go to Draw Screen'),
+            ),
+          ],
+        ),
+      ),
+    );
   }
 }
